title: Post-Workshop Survey for Code.org's Professional Development Facilitators - PD Workshop

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for facilitating a Code.org professional development workshop!

After leading your professional learning workshop, we ask that you please take 3 minutes to share some feedback about your workshop experience as a facilitator.

In the event that Code.org shares feedback with workshop organizers, we will do our best to anonymize your responses.

elements.name: workshop_info_section_intro
elements.html:
Your Code.org Professional Learning Workshop

Please fill in the details about the Code.org professional learning workshop you facilitated.

elements.name: pd_content
elements.title: What content was the focus of the PD workshop you facilitated?

choices.text: Teaching micro:bit Maker Module for Elementary
CSD Unit 1 - Problem Solving in Computing
CSD Unit 3 - Interactive Animations and Games
CSD Unit 6 - Creating Apps with Devices (Circuit Playground)
CSD Unit 6 - Creating Apps with Devices (micro:bit)
CSD Unit 7 - AI and Machine Learning

elements.name: experience_section_intro
elements.html:
Your Experience Facilitating Code.org Professional Learning Workshops

The following section includes questions to helps us understand your experience facilitating professional learning workshops focused on {pd_content} and how we at Code.org can support you better.

elements.name: intent_to_repeat
elements.title: After facilitating this Code.org professional learning workshop, are you interested in facilitating a Code.org professional learning workshop again?

elements.name: intent_to_repeat_comment
elements.title: If you would like to, please use this space to share any thoughts about whether you are interested in facilitating a Code.org professional learning workshop again.

elements.name: preparation_time
elements.title: How long did it take you to prepare for this workshop?
elements.description: (Round to the  nearest number of hours)

elements.name: resources_effectiveness
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about how prepared you felt to successfully lead the workshop?

rows.text: The PL Workshop Resource (slide deck with high-level agenda and objectives) provided by Code.org was easily customizable to meet the specific needs of the workshop audience.
The PL Workshop resource (slide deck with high-level agenda and objectives) helped me feel set-up to facilitate the workshop successfully
The PL workshop facilitator training helped me to feel set-up to facilitate this workshop successfully

Thank You!
